author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video to find out how White Paper Games used UE5 to create nail-biting thriller 'I AM RIPPER.’

Tactile gameplay and a player-driven, branching narrative take the latest project from White Paper Games to a whole new level of immersive storytelling. 

This interview explores the team’s use of key Unreal Engine 5 features such as Motion Matching, Control Rig, and Sequencer to bring the gripping, gritty, and sometimes gut-wrenching story to life.

To find out more about developing games in Unreal Engine, check out our website: unrealengine.com/uses/indie-games 

#WhitePaperGames #IAMRIPPER, #UnrealEngine5, #UE5, #UE4, #MotionMatching, #ControlRig, #Sequencer,
title: I AM RIPPER | Game Profile | Unreal Engine
